name: TASTE TRACKER
desc: Developed and launched Taste Tracker, an innovative culinary companion app, revolutionizing recipe exploration, mastery, and excitement, catering to both seasoned chefs and kitchen novices.

name: CLOUD CAPTAIN
desc: Simple landing page website built using HTML, CSS, JavaScript and some JavaScript Libraries.

name: CURE LOCATOR
desc: Cure Locator is an Android app assisting users in finding top-rated nearby doctors. Users can access detailed doctor profiles, showcasing their education, ratings, location, and contact details.
